name: SpringHill Suites Detroit Southfield

reviews.text: I can write a book about the excellence of staff and facility at Springhill Suites in Southfield. For three years, we have stayed here and leave amazed at our experience. Although we've thoroughly enjoyed the nice, clean rooms and the scrumptious breakfast buffet, our greatest experience is with Sales Manager Aretha Trice and her awesome staff. From even before our arrival to our departure, she has made sure that we receive great care and support from everyone there. We love the conference that we attend every year and absolutely love the family we now have at Springhill Suites in Southfield, MI!!!
reviews.title: Wouldn't Want to Stay Anywhere Else!

reviews.text: Our group has stayed at this facility for group functions over the past two years and have nothing but positive feedback. Our rooms have always been ready when we arrive, the staff is professional, the facility is clean, and the service is always outstanding! Not only will we return as a group, but we will also use this facility for individual stays. A special thanks to the Sales Manager Aretha Trice for courteous, professional service and for always making this facility our home away from home!
reviews.title: Excellent Stay! Spectacular Service!

reviews.text: The customer service @SpringHill suites was absolutely awesome. We traveled with approximately 42 people for a leadership conference and the staff met every need that we requested. I highly recommend this hotel to anyone traveling in the Detroit area. The staff was courteous and friendly during all times of the day. Thank you for your hardwork and dedication to creating a home away from home.
reviews.title: Supberb Customer Service

reviews.text: When booking a block of rooms, one would expect that a block would mean that you and your companions would be located in the same proximity as the others. Especially when you request this 2 months before your stay and verify the day before arrival. Mmmmm, no, do not expect this request to be accommodates at this property.
reviews.title: Great stay

reviews.text: We stay in Southfield in the Telegraph Rd / 12 Mile Rd area a few times a year and have used many of the local hotels. This was our first stay at the Springhill Suites, and it's our new favorite in the area. The hotel seems quite new, and it is in very good shape. The staff is very friendly and helpful. The hotel offers a nice complimentary breakfast and has free wireless internet in the guest rooms. Right next door is a Tim Horton's and a Leo's Coney Island.
reviews.title: New favorite in Southfield

reviews.text: the amorous couple next door to me tested the lack of thickness of the walls. also loud patrons at 130 in the AM on a Monday night in the halls.

reviews.text: Ive been staying here on a eegular basis since 2006. I don't want to stay anywhere else...the location, value and customer service can't be beat! However, it's been about 6 mos since my last stay and the attention to detail is slipping. The staff took care of the issues and issued me 2000 bonus points. So I'll go back and am hopeful it will have improved.
reviews.title: My favorite place to stay needs some attention

reviews.text: A very nice hotel. Definitely will come back again. We stay there on Canadian Thanksgiving with 3 kids. The room size is huge with 2 queen size beds and a sleeper sofa. Comes with microwave, coffee machine and a kitchen sink. It is also next door to a 24 hours Tim Hortons. Breakfast has good seletions; boiled eggs, cereals, yogurts, oatmeal, juice and coffee. Business centre has 1 computer with a printer so you can print your coupons. Room has very high ceiling too. We stay on the lower floor and did not hear any noise but the town was extremely quiet, even at the outlet mall.
reviews.title: Nice hotel and next to a Tim Hortons

reviews.text: Went for an overnight stay with friends and was pleased with this hotel.
reviews.title: "Overnight stay with friends"

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stopped in for 2 nights and were unsure of the area or the hotel. On arrival, we were greeted enthusiastically by the front desk staff and promptly checked in. The rooms are much the same as any Springhill property, which I find to be generally spacious and clean. There are no restaurants or anything other than fast food close by.. but the staff gave us a list of area restaurants that were all within a short drive (don't plan on walking, even though that was what we were hoping for). We were heading downtown for an event, and not wanting to drive, 4 of us took a cab... $50 each way, which we felt was reasonable. All in all a good hotel in a nice area and close (enough) to downtown. We'd certainly stay at this property again if we were headed to a concert or a ball game.
reviews.title: Staff very helpful... nice and clean

reviews.text: We stayed at Spring Hill Suites August 19-21 for a family weekend. It was by far one of the best places we have stayed. The location waseasy to find & very convienent - we went to the Detroit Zoo and to a Tiger's game (the hotel was about 10 minutes from the zoo and about 25 minutes from the game). The rooms were wonderful - very clean, very comfortable bed, mini fridge, microwave and a shower that actually had great water pressure!!! The morning breakfast (included with room rate) was very good - waffles, oatmeal, eggs, biscuits & gravy, bagels, muffins, cereal, fresh fruit etc. The quality & quantity of food was excellent! We played in the pool and it was very clean - the water was a little cold, but that is coming from someone who hesitates to go in their own pool at home unless the water is above 85 degrees!! Our 4 year old grandson didn't seem too bothered by the temperature! The check in and check out process was flawless and quick. The staff, from manager to room cleaners to breakfast staff were very personable, friendly and helpful. We will definitely stay here again if we are in the area.
reviews.title: Great Hotel!

reviews.text: Nice room with pullout couch for kids and TV that swivels from the "living room" to the "bedroom." Pool is tiny and was a bit cloudy. Hot tub jets didn't seem to work. Waffle and pancake makers at free breakfast were a hit with kids, but I was disappointed in the lack of fruit. Hotel staff seemed especially friendly. Hotel has easy access to highway for a 20-minute drive downtown.
reviews.title: good, not great

reviews.text: The Springhill Suites is an exceptional hotel. The staff was always smiling and ready to served you no matter what the need. At different times I would stop by the hotel unannounced and I found no surprises. The lobby was always clean and well put together. I request to view a room each visit and they were clean, lovely setting and comfortable to look at.
reviews.title: The SpringHill Suites was the best and we loved the staff.

reviews.text: I enjoyed the breakfast which was hot, tasty, on time and plentiful.
reviews.title: Disappointed

reviews.text: I recently attended a funeral in Detroit Michigan. Although this was a difficult time for me and my family the staff at SpringHill Suites were so attentive and caring that it made our trip much more pleasant than we could ever imagine. I have stayed at Marriott properties all over the United States and I can't remember a time when I felt such a connection with the front desk. Glynis makes you feel welcomed and cared for from check-in to check-out. I was only there one night but they made a lasting impression on me and my family.
reviews.title: Short Pleasant Stay

reviews.text: The location of this hotel made me give it a try. It is located close to both 696 and Telegraph Rd so getting to other Detroit suburbs is very easy. What keeps me coming back is outstanding customer service. Glynis and the rest of the staff at the front desk go out of their way to make sure your needs are taken care of. Beyond that, it is very convenient to have coin-operated laundry at this location. If you travel to Detroit for an extended stay- this is the place to go.
reviews.title: Convenient Extended Stay Hotel

reviews.text: I had many people help me while I was there, but I have to say that Shawn stood out as a true example of someone that not only takes her job seriously, but who seemed to genuinely care about me and the other customers I saw her help.
reviews.title: Great, personable service!
